statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.MenuID , AA.ViewID , AA.Parameter FROM dbo.TMenuView AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.MenuID , AA.ViewID , AA.Parameter FROM dbo.TMenuView AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.MenuID = #MenuID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TMenuView ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, MenuID, ViewID, Parameter ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #MenuID#, #ViewID#, #Parameter# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TMenuView SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, MenuID = #MenuID# , ViewID = #ViewID# , Parameter = #Parameter# WHERE ID = #ID#
